name: Bone Marrow Rebirth (SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis Demo)
name_original: Bone Marrow Rebirth (SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis Demo)
description:
Bone Marrow is a game in the genre of role-playing board logic puzzle. Combine the figures, increase your characteristics and do away with evil but consider the wrong step can lead to irreversible consequences!
